{"id":585264493,"lang":"python3","time":"1Â month","timestamp":1636591651,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"152 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/585264493/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find Pivot Index","memory":"15.4 MB","code":"class Solution:\n    def pivotIndex(self, nums: List[int]) -> int:\n        left = 0\n        right = sum(nums)\n        for i in range(0,len(nums)):\n            if right - left == nums[i]:\n                return i        \n            right -= nums[i]\n            left += nums[i]\n        return -1\n","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-pivot-index"}
